BigNumber [currently in beta] is designed to get our brains working. The rule of the game is simple; always pick the bigger number.\nThis game is being designed and developed by Onur; an independent app developer. For more information about Onur\'s works please visit:
Our decimal numbers are shown like this:
This means that 22,3 is 3 step greater than 22 and 7 step smaller than 23.
